Posts.Content: Hi, I wonder who has had a positive experience about claiming for critical illness cover? I hadn't even thought about it until last week and I was diagnosed in December. Needless to say, I have had other things on my mind in the last few months!
Posts.Title: Insurance claims

Posts.Content: Hi, I had my 1st taxotere on Wed and from Friday afternoon my legs have been aching. I don't have a temperature. I wondered who else has had this and how long for/ does it move around etc?. Paracetamol didn't seem to help.Â
